Key Match Events: Michael Harris II made a jaw-dropping home run robbery in the 7th inning, robbing Austin Hays of a home run
Post-Match Reflections: Atlanta manager Brian Snitker said the Harris catch was 'the catch of the year' and 'a God-given ability'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves lost 3-0 to the Phillies, further damaging their division title hopes
The Braves have allowed three runs or fewer in 20 straight games, extending their longest single-season streak since 1893
